description: The children to render. Usually a DropdownTrigger and DropdownMenu elements.
Type of overlay that is opened by the dropdown trigger.
How the dropdown menu is triggered.
Whether the dropdown trigger is disabled.
Whether the dropdown menu should be closed when an item is selected.
Whether the dropdown menu should block scrolling outside the menu.
Since the dropdown is an extension of the popover, it accepts all the props of the popover component.
